Question
========
According to the postulates of special relativity, the speed of light in a vacuum

Answerlist
----------
* depends on the speed of the light source.
* depends on the speed of the observer.
* is constant for all observers regardless of their motion.
* is constant only in the rest frame of the ether.

Solution
========
The speed of light is constant for all observers regardless of their motion.
